title: Ã…rets Feteste Fyr
overview: Eight fat guys have gathered for pranks and fun in Gran Canaria to find out which of them will return to the motherland with the title of the fattest guy of the year.What do you think happens if you take four party-happy guys from the village and four equally party-happy guys from Oslo, and gather them for light-hearted competitions and challenges in the south? Yes, then you will find out who is the fattest guy of the year!In this web series, you will become better acquainted with an unbridled group of boys on a boy's trip to Gran Canaria. Every day, they will compete in the least intelligent challenges and unscrupulous tasks imaginable, where the winner gets honor and glory, while the losers are punished. It's hard and brutal in true Jackass style, and bruises, vomiting and roars of laughter sit loose. To win the title, they must prove that they are the most playful, street-smart and daring guy on Playa del Ingles. Together they will bring the most shame and some pride in their gender. This is necessary when we on TV3 play nominate the fattest guy of the year!
